title: hitGrouped.vm isn't shipped with 3.x
description: A user reported getting "Can't find resource 'hitGrouped.vm'" when trying /browse?q=Titel%3Anike&group=true&group.field=EAN on a 3.x version.  Looking at svn, we don't ship hitGrouped.vm on 3.x, but we do on trunk/4.0.

comments.author: Erik Hatcher
comments.content: +1 - you wanna take this one and commit it, Jan?
